metadata.title: CVE-2024-27508 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Atheme 7.2.12 contains a memory leak vulnerability in/atheme/src/crypto-benchmark/main.c.

criterions.comment: atheme-services: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
